issue.title: C++: Add google/benchmark to the 3rd-party build toolchain
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-28](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-28). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/google/benchmark, to assist with building a microbenchmark suite.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-28?focusedCommentId=15198493) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
I'd be happy to take this, if no one is currently working on it ...

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-28?focusedCommentId=15198504) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Please do! We'll probably want to start a little benchmarking tools module to assist with data generation and other common stuff for microbenchmarking.
